skillTree.name: Silvaron
skillTree.description: This proud and noble Unicorn elevates the Enchantress above her host, so all may see and be strengthened by her blessed presence.

skillTree.name: Loremaster, Lore of Life
skillTree.description: No one is more accomplished in the Lore of Life than the Fay Enchantress.

effects.description: Cooldown: -25% to Lore of Life spells
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "The Dwellers Below Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Regrowth Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Shield of Thorns Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Power Familiar
skillTree.description: Whether a former Wizard who displeased the Enchantress or merely a toad, this magic-imbued amphibian strengthens her spells whilst weakening those of her opponents.

skillTree.name: Blessed Water
skillTree.description: "By this blessed water, prepare us for your service, dear Lady."

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +30% for Battle Pilgrim and Grail Reliquae units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Secrets of the Grail
skillTree.description: "What is the secret of the Grail? Whom does it serve?"

effects.description:
Magic resistance: 20% for Battle Pilgrim and Grail Reliquae units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Virtue of Empathy
skillTree.description: Led by noble example, peasants fight longer and harder lest their Lord be dishonoured.

skillTree.name: Lionhearted
skillTree.description: Like the lion, this one is the biggest and the bravest of his kind... with the sharpest teeth.

skillTree.name: Basic Training
skillTree.description: Thorough drilling increases the peasants' chances of withstanding the horrors of battle.

skillTree.name: Girdle of Gold
skillTree.description: By which the person of the Fay Enchantress may remain unmolested in the face of sustained attack.

skillTree.name: Beacon of Devotion
skillTree.description: The Fay is the spiritual representation of the Lady, her blessing upon a shrine can bring the goddess close.

skillTree.name: Sacred Duty
skillTree.description: Those touched by the Grail are utterly devoted and would lay down their life for the Fay Enchantress.

effects.description:
Recruit rank: +2 for Grail Knights and Grail Guardians units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +5 for Grail Knights and Grail Guardians units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +5 for Grail Knights and Grail Guardians units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Lady of the Land
skillTree.description: The magic of the Fay Enchantress is fundamentally tied to the lands of the Bretonni.

skillTree.name: Secrets of the Otherworld
skillTree.description: The Enchantress gathers the young and brings them to the otherworld, where some are blessed to return as damsels.

effects.description:
Ward save: 10% for Prophetess Lords and embedded Damsel Heroes
	(all armies)

skillTree.name: Awakening of the Wood
skillTree.description: Trees live for thousands of years and have very long memories. When called to fight, centuries of pent-up wrath are unleashed.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Awakening of the Wood"

skillTree.name: Life Bloom
skillTree.description: Even the simplest of spells can bring forth the full bloom of renewal, reinvigorating and healing the broken and bleeding.

skillTree.name: Earth Blood
skillTree.description: The Wizard draws wholesome energies from the soil, imbuing companions with the natural resilience of the earth.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Earth Blood"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Earth Blood Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Earth Blood Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Shield of Thorns
skillTree.description: Prickly gorse bursts from the ground around the caster's allies, protecting them from attack like a spiky, living shield.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Shield of Thorns"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Shield of Thorns Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Shield of Thorns Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Flesh to Stone
skillTree.description: This spell temporarily transforms allies' mortal flesh into unbreakable rock, increasing tenfold their resistance to attack.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Flesh to Stone"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Flesh to Stone Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Flesh to Stone Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Regrowth
skillTree.description: By speaking Druthandor's name the Wizard is able to heal allies' injuries much faster than by natural means.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Regrowth Upgraded"

skillTree.name: The Dwellers Below
skillTree.description: This spell causes gnarled, fibrous hands to emerge from beneath the ground, dragging the foe to a claustrophobic, suffocating end.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "The Dwellers Below"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "The Dwellers Below Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "The Dwellers Below Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Earthing
skillTree.description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

skillTree.name: Magical Reserves
skillTree.description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

skillTree.name: Inspiring Presence
skillTree.description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

skillTree.name: Low-Born Militia
skillTree.description: Even stupid peasants can learn to stand fast and brace against the charge.

effects.description:
Leadership: +4 for Peasant Mob, Men-at-Arms, and Spearmen-at-Arms units
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +6 for Peasant Mob, Men-at-Arms, and Spearmen-at-Arms units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +4 for Peasant Mob, Men-at-Arms, and Spearmen-at-Arms units
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +8 for Peasant Mob, Men-at-Arms, and Spearmen-at-Arms units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +8 for Peasant Mob, Men-at-Arms, and Spearmen-at-Arms units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Peasant Proficiency
skillTree.description: Even dull and stupid peasants can aim a bow, but with a little training they can learn to shoot with some success.

effects.description:
Ammunition: +10% for Peasant Bowmen and Mounted Yeomen Archers units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +15% for Peasant Bowmen and Mounted Yeomen Archers units
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +5% for Peasant Bowmen and Mounted Yeomen Archers units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +20% for Peasant Bowmen and Mounted Yeomen Archers units
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +10% for Peasant Bowmen and Mounted Yeomen Archers units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Worshippers of the Grail
skillTree.description: Drink from the chalice. You will be reborn.

effects.description:
Armour: +6 for Grail Reliquae, Battle Pilgrims, and Foot Squires units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Grail Reliquae, Battle Pilgrims, and Foot Squires units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +9 for Grail Reliquae, Battle Pilgrims, and Foot Squires units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +8 for Grail Reliquae, Battle Pilgrims, and Foot Squires units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +12 for Grail Reliquae, Battle Pilgrims, and Foot Squires units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Glorfinial's Progeny
skillTree.description: The bloodline of the noblest of all steeds has been preserved; it serves us still.

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +6 for Mounted Yeomen, Knights Errant, Knights of the Realm, Questing Knights, Grail Knights, and Grail Guardians units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +5% for Mounted Yeomen, Knights Errant, Knights of the Realm, Questing Knights, Grail Knights, and Grail Guardians units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +9 for Mounted Yeomen, Knights Errant, Knights of the Realm, Questing Knights, Grail Knights, and Grail Guardians units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +10% for Mounted Yeomen, Knights Errant, Knights of the Realm, Questing Knights, Grail Knights, and Grail Guardians units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12 for Mounted Yeomen, Knights Errant, Knights of the Realm, Questing Knights, Grail Knights, and Grail Guardians units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Guardians of the Lady
skillTree.description: Those who serve the Lady purely are rewarded with a portion of her strength when battle is joined.

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +6 for Pegasus Knights, Royal Pegasus Knights, and Royal Hippogryph Knights units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +6% for Pegasus Knights, Royal Pegasus Knights, and Royal Hippogryph Knights units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +9 for Pegasus Knights, Royal Pegasus Knights, and Royal Hippogryph Knights units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +12% for Pegasus Knights, Royal Pegasus Knights, and Royal Hippogryph Knights units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12 for Pegasus Knights, Royal Pegasus Knights, and Royal Hippogryph Knights units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Engines of War
skillTree.description: Although nothing can replace the thrill of the charge and the righteous clash of steel, seriously heavy artillery generally helps.

effects.description:
Missile strength: +6% for Field Trebuchet units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +10% for Field Trebuchet units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +8% for Field Trebuchet units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +20% for Field Trebuchet units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +10% for Field Trebuchet units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: The Peasant's Duty
skillTree.description: When the alternative probably involves being killed by their own side, the smallfolk tend to rise to the occasion...

effects.description:
Physical resistance: 15% for Peasant Mob, Men-at-Arms, Spearmen-at-Arms, Grail Reliquae, Battle Pilgrims, and Foot Squires units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +5 for Peasant Mob, Men-at-Arms, Spearmen-at-Arms, Grail Reliquae, Battle Pilgrims, and Foot Squires units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +12 for Peasant Mob, Men-at-Arms, Spearmen-at-Arms, Grail Reliquae, Battle Pilgrims, and Foot Squires units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Protectors of the Realm
skillTree.description: There are literally no opponents too great for them to face down. None.

effects.description:
Armour: +12 for Mounted Yeomen, Knights Errant, Knights of the Realm, Questing Knights, and Pegasus Knights units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +5 for Mounted Yeomen, Knights Errant, Knights of the Realm, Questing Knights, and Pegasus Knights units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12 for Mounted Yeomen, Knights Errant, Knights of the Realm, Questing Knights, and Pegasus Knights units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Chivalric Code
skillTree.description: Thou shalt be everywhere and always the champion of the Right and the Good against Injustice and Evil.

effects.description:
Ward save: 8% for Grail Knights, Grail Guardians, Royal Pegasus Knights, and Royal Hippogryph Knights units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +10% for Grail Knights, Grail Guardians, Royal Pegasus Knights, and Royal Hippogryph Knights units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +5 for Grail Knights, Grail Guardians, Royal Pegasus Knights, and Royal Hippogryph Knights units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Guided by the Lady
skillTree.description: Many Bretonnian veterans speak of a soothing presence felt on occasion in the heat of battle, helping them to find their mark and keep their cool.

effects.description:
Reload time reduction: +10% for Peasant Bowmen, Mounted Yeomen Archers, and Field Trebuchet units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +10% for Peasant Bowmen, Mounted Yeomen Archers, and Field Trebuchet units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Range: +10% for Peasant Bowmen, Mounted Yeomen Archers, and Field Trebuchet units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Route Marcher
skillTree.description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

skillTree.name: Justiciar
skillTree.description: As an expert in such matters, it is their duty to know the king's law and to mete justice in his name.

skillTree.name: Bonded Service
skillTree.description: The Lords rule, the peasants toil. Nothing has changed in over a thousand years.

skillTree.name: Tenth-Share
skillTree.description: The Lord is entitled to collect tithes from tenants in return for continued protection.

skillTree.name: Devoted of the Goddess
skillTree.description: They've seen the Lady's acts or witnessed her blessed grace.

skillTree.name: Gifted Beginnings
skillTree.description: It falls to the privileged few to tell the many of the Lady's blessed will.

effects.description:
Hero recruit rank: +5 for Damsels
	(local province)

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: Steward of the Realm
skillTree.description: "The land from here to the sea is yours, if you enforce the king's will."

skillTree.name: Lordly Conqueror
skillTree.description: The knowledge that they fight in the king's name, with his support, steels an army for the privations of the siege.

skillTree.name: Premonition
skillTree.description: This being must be touched by Tzeentch, seeing things before they happen.

effects.description: Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +8%
Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +15%

skillTree.name: Bailiff
skillTree.description: Lords must not be concerned with the collecting of taxes; there are others whose lot it is to feel the people's scorn.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -15% for Lore of Life

items.name: Chalice of Potions
items.description: The pellet with the poison is in the vessel with the pestle; the chalice from the palace has the brew that is true…

backgroundSkills.name: Supreme Aura of the Lady
backgroundSkills.description: A figure of awe and inspiration, hers is the will of the goddess.

effects.description: Passive ability: "The Blessing of the Lady"

Upkeep greatly reduced for:
	Grail Guardians
	(Lord's army)

backgroundSkills.name: [Hidden] Awakening of the Wood
backgroundSkills.description: Trees live for thousands of years and have very long memories. When called to fight, centuries of pent-up wrath are unleashed.

backgroundSkills.name: Knight's Vow
backgroundSkills.description:
"When the clarion call is sounded
	 I will ride out and fight in the name of Liege and Lady
	Whilst I draw breath the lands bequeathed
	 unto me will remain untainted by evil
	 Honour is all, Chivalry is all..."

backgroundSkills.name: Questing Vow
backgroundSkills.description:
"I set down my lance, symbol of duty
	I spurn those whom I love
	I relinquish all and take up the tools of my quest
	No obstacle will stand before me
	No plea for help shall find me waiting
	No moon will look upon me twice lest I be judged idle
	I give my body, heart and soul to the Lady whom I seek..."

backgroundSkills.name: Grail Vow
backgroundSkills.description:
"That which is sacrosanct I shall preserve
	 That which is sublime I will protect
	That which threatens I will destroy
	For my holy wrath will know no bounds..."
